name: Hawkeye
description: With only a bow, a quiver of arrows, and enough self-confidence to rival anyone, Clint Barton has proven himself to truly be one of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. An expert marksman and fighter, Barton puts his talents to good use as the hero Hawkeye. Opinionated and possessing a reputation for finding trouble, he remains a strong team player and has both been a part of, and leader of, a number of different teams over his storied career.
